duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and maintain the resident dining experience, including restaurant, bar, catering, and special events.
Assist Executive Chef in all aspects of the Food & Beverage experience for the community.
Maintain a high level of resident contact throughout service hours and resolve complaints concerning dining service.
Ensure compliance with all company, local, state and federal safety rules and regulations.
Create and maintain a positive team atmosphere in the workplace and provide leadership and direction to property employees.
Create and maintain S.O.P.'s for the operation and residents.
Maintain an inventory of all dining room items and champion private and special event space and bookings.

education_certification.credential: High school graduate; Degree of higher learning preferred; Servsafe and CPR certified.
